item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

22. Show HN: FTWA – Turn any website into an app (97 points | 33 comments)
23. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (92 points | 44 comments)
24. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (149 points | 303 comments)
25. Show HN: A Markdown-based alternative to package.json scripts and makefiles (86 points | 34 comments)
26. Big advance on simple-sounding math problem was a century in the making (103 points | 27 comments)
27. The Sundial Cannon of Åtvidaberg (2017) (52 points | 24 comments)
28. Web Browser Engineering (2021) (698 points | 112 comments)
